name: Birthday Cake
description: Summons a Birthday Cake that recovers energy when Exp. points are acquired. It'll be effective only when summoned away at a certain distance from the town. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Goggle
description: A stylish goggle accessory with a fine silver decoration. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Napoleon Hat
description: A Napoleon Hat accessory that has world conquering energy. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Horn Hairband
description: A pink hairband accessory with a cute horn dangling. Exclusive to females. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Black Gem Mask
description: A black gem mask accessory made of luxurious metal material. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Plastic Hair
description: Plastic Hair. It changes to an attractive pink wig for female and a blue wig for male. Uses 2 accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Beast Soulshot
description: The light of Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Soulshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

name: Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner, so it instantly increases the magic power of pet/summoner. It is very light. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Spiritshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of high-level Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner, so it instantly increases the magic power of pet/summoner. It is very light. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Blessed Spiritshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

name: Rune of Experience Points 30%
description: An ancient charm endowed with mysterious symbols. When held in your inventory, increases acquired Experience Points by 30%. The timer decreases even during log-off state. Only one XP Rune can be applied at any given time regardless of additional XP Runes in ones inventory. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold
